column5: Toured this AM with Laker John and passed Finkles - gonna be a while!!!!!!David  aka  Superdad
You got that right. Thanks for the update David.
no no you can see water.... just a little work with a sledgehammer and you will reach clear water.....  Art

I was on Loughborough today, there is still at least thirty inches of ice.  A little bit punky on top, and close to shore there is a skim over maybe five inches of water, but still lots of ice..............  Doug
